body_html:
That's a side effect but not a guarantee. Typically memory consumption is lower bounded by the frame count of you're doing backprop. Have you tried using recompute_grad?
…

body:
That's a side effect but not a guarantee. Typically memory consumption is
lower bounded by the frame count of you're doing backprop.  Have you tried
using recompute_grad?
